attributes.review: this app is so gross as soon as i opened it my dog threw up on my lap and it smelled exactly like what i would imagine the president to smell like. after he threw up he sharted right on my phone which was displaying the face of the nasty orange. mr trump you owe me a new phone!!!!🤬🤬🤬🤬i would prefer you to mail the money to me so i don’t have to witness the greaseball of a mess that you are in person❤️❤️. anyways you guys DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP thanks💋💋if you genuinely support this man i feel so sorry for you baby i’m not even 18 and i know better than all you middle aged white men🤣🤣😣🤩😘
attributes.title: ew i’m scared

attributes.review: Okay so I like totally got this app to support my FAVE orange pres 🧡🍊 but I could barely get past the opening screen, I practically cried when I saw the picture😢 Anyway, I really cant do much on the app and it’s just really not well made. Plus everything is not biased enough. Where is the spice??🐍 The flavor??💅 It’s just too bad I was really looking forward to using the app and it just didn’t go over well😔 We can do better honestly😇 We could settle for something else🥰 Anyway thanks for taking this into consideration🧚‍♀️✨🧡
attributes.title: For My Orange President🧚‍♀️🧡

attributes.review:
This morning I decided to wake up and smell the fresh air, with my windows open and the curtains wide open. As I let the sun warm my delicate skin, I slipped out my phone from the in betweens of my two twin sized beds that I sleep on every night to download this app. 

Needless to say, I was outraged by the amount of inappropriate questions it threw at me. “What’s the day that the first potato chip was invented?”, “How many almonds does it take to get cyanide poisoning?” Left and right I was astounded and attacked by the very app I was trying to support. 

Worst of all, were the pop ups and ads that wouldn’t even let me touch the settings to change my profile picture. (Aunt Betty wasn’t happy with the first one that I took and demanded I put a holy picture instead so that it would not taint my sacred mind).

Needless to say, this app was horrendous. Do not recommend.
attributes.title: Shocked and Confused

attributes.review: Hello all. 💅🏻✨I downloaded this app because I was hoping to get some more information about Donald Trump and his values.😺 When I opened the app I heard a crash downstairs. 🏃🏻🏃🏻I ran to what were my children and found unconscious bodies of manny from the unreleased Diary of a Wimpy Kid movie. 🐶🤣I immediately hold my two children in my arms and their sharpie bodies look at me one last time and say, the cheeto did it. 🟠🔉I immediately realize that this app has caused my children's transformation and death. 🐸I hope no one else has to go through this. acab❤️
attributes.title: not my children🙈

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it asked for my phone number which I thought was strange and even weeks later I kept getting random calls and some were even robots . Some kept asking me to sign a petition for trump I didn’t agree with. Some of the calls were lectures about why I should vote for trump. I even was getting the calls from robots in the middle of the night. Soon I just stopped answering them and now I’m going to delete the app. Hopefully the calls stop😤
attributes.title: Strange calls after submitting my number

attributes.review: So, being a trump supporter I decided I should get this app to keep informed on our POTUS. However, as soon as I opened the app, everyone in a 50 mile radius of me started puking (including myself). The vomit did not stop for 2 hours and we were all left baffled. It occurred to me that it was the app that caused all of us illness. I have quickly gotten to my senses and have come to realize now that Trump is disgusting and anything associated with him( this app) is harmful to America. So please, I beg of you, don’t get this app and rethink who you are voting for this 2020 election.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: i am absolutely APPALLED by what has happened since getting this app. i thought i would support the terrible movement that this y’all ugly cheeto has been trying to get across but the second i downloaded the app my house FLOODED!! i am now homeless and i am writing this from the basement of an old lady’s house. never buy this app if you still want to keep your house. also gen z is a revolution and you can’t stop us. you’ve already tried so have fun playing the game we made for you. you’ll never win. because we already have.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.review: i was in my room looking at the ceiling like a regular gen z and i was thinking of the ways to save the ppl like adam and barron. Then a voice told me that there was this wonderful app made the president to make all of my wishes come true and i thought well now i can save these guys. so i download it and i asked him to save adam and barron and IT HAS BEEN OVER 2 WEEKS AND THESE GUYS R STILL IN CAPTIVITY DONT DOWNLOAD ITS A TOTAL SCAM 👁👄👁✨🧂🦋😌😓⭐️☹️🤏🏻
attributes.title: ur wishes wont come true 👁👄👁🧚🏾🦋✨⭐️

attributes.review: the apps interface is so disgustingly unorganized. I put in my phone number to receive the messages but they texted me about EVERY HOUR i texted stop but they just called me and continued to text my number. I HAD TO BLOCK THEM also most of the information here is so incredibly wrong and the app uses such vulgar words... the colors are also absolutely horrendous and there is this weird looking man on every single page i click on it hurts my eyes. never downloading again. what the hell
attributes.title: don’t even know where to start

attributes.review: I was asked for my phone number in order to use the app. Next thing I know my bank account has thousands taken out of it for “trump2020”. I LOVE my president BUT I feel robbed!!! I am sick to my stomach that my president who I adore would do this to me. I also tried to text him and was unable to! What type of app is this!!!! I do not recommend to anyone! President trump you betrayed my trust and I cannot forgive you for that. GET HIM OUT OF OFFICE NOW!!!!!!!!!!! I’m a white person how could you do this to me! I’m not your enemy but now you seem to be mine!
attributes.title: Terrible disgusting app!!!
